personagens.name: Aatrox
personagens.title: the Darkin Blade
personagens.blurb: Once honored defenders of Shurima against the Void, Aatrox and his brethren would eventually become an even greater threat to Runeterra, and were defeated only by cunning mortal sorcery. But after centuries of imprisonment, Aatrox was the first to find...

personagens.name: Ahri
personagens.title: the Nine-Tailed Fox
personagens.blurb: Innately connected to the latent power of Runeterra, Ahri is a vastaya who can reshape magic into orbs of raw energy. She revels in toying with her prey by manipulating their emotions before devouring their life essence. Despite her predatory nature...

personagens.name: Akali
personagens.title: the Rogue Assassin
personagens.blurb: Abandoning the Kinkou Order and her title of the Fist of Shadow, Akali now strikes alone, ready to be the deadly weapon her people need. Though she holds onto all she learned from her master Shen, she has pledged to defend Ionia from its enemies, one...

personagens.name: Akshan
personagens.title: the Rogue Sentinel
personagens.blurb: Raising an eyebrow in the face of danger, Akshan fights evil with dashing charisma, righteous vengeance, and a conspicuous lack of shirts. He is highly skilled in the art of stealth combat, able to evade the eyes of his enemies and reappear when they...

personagens.name: Alistar
personagens.title: the Minotaur
personagens.blurb: Always a mighty warrior with a fearsome reputation, Alistar seeks revenge for the death of his clan at the hands of the Noxian empire. Though he was enslaved and forced into the life of a gladiator, his unbreakable will was what kept him from truly...

personagens.name: Amumu
personagens.title: the Sad Mummy
personagens.blurb: Legend claims that Amumu is a lonely and melancholy soul from ancient Shurima, roaming the world in search of a friend. Doomed by an ancient curse to remain alone forever, his touch is death, his affection ruin. Those who claim to have seen him describe...

personagens.name: Anivia
personagens.title: the Cryophoenix
personagens.blurb: Anivia is a benevolent winged spirit who endures endless cycles of life, death, and rebirth to protect the Freljord. A demigod born of unforgiving ice and bitter winds, she wields those elemental powers to thwart any who dare disturb her homeland...

personagens.name: Annie
personagens.title: the Dark Child
personagens.blurb: Dangerous, yet disarmingly precocious, Annie is a child mage with immense pyromantic power. Even in the shadows of the mountains north of Noxus, she is a magical outlier. Her natural affinity for fire manifested early in life through unpredictable...

personagens.name: Aphelios
personagens.title: the Weapon of the Faithful
personagens.blurb: Emerging from moonlight's shadow with weapons drawn, Aphelios kills the enemies of his faith in brooding silenceâ€”speaking only through the certainty of his aim, and the firing of each gun. Though fueled by a poison that renders him mute, he is guided by...

personagens.name: Ashe
personagens.title: the Frost Archer
personagens.blurb: Iceborn warmother of the Avarosan tribe, Ashe commands the most populous horde in the north. Stoic, intelligent, and idealistic, yet uncomfortable with her role as leader, she taps into the ancestral magics of her lineage to wield a bow of True Ice...

personagens.name: Aurelion Sol
personagens.title: The Star Forger
personagens.blurb: Aurelion Sol once graced the vast emptiness of the cosmos with celestial wonders of his own devising. Now, he is forced to wield his awesome power at the behest of a space-faring empire that tricked him into servitude. Desiring a return to his...

personagens.name: Azir
personagens.title: the Emperor of the Sands
personagens.blurb: Azir was a mortal emperor of Shurima in a far distant age, a proud man who stood at the cusp of immortality. His hubris saw him betrayed and murdered at the moment of his greatest triumph, but now, millennia later, he has been reborn as an Ascended...

personagens.name: Bard
personagens.title: the Wandering Caretaker
personagens.blurb: A traveler from beyond the stars, Bard is an agent of serendipity who fights to maintain a balance where life can endure the indifference of chaos. Many Runeterrans sing songs that ponder his extraordinary nature, yet they all agree that the cosmic...

personagens.name: Bel'Veth
personagens.title: the Empress of the Void
personagens.blurb: A nightmarish empress created from the raw material of an entire devoured city, Bel'Veth is the end of Runeterra itself... and the beginning of a monstrous reality of her own design. Driven by epochs of repurposed history, knowledge, and memories from...

personagens.name: Blitzcrank
personagens.title: the Great Steam Golem
personagens.blurb: Blitzcrank is an enormous, near-indestructible automaton from Zaun, originally built to dispose of hazardous waste. However, he found this primary purpose too restricting, and modified his own form to better serve the fragile people of the Sump...

personagens.name: Brand
personagens.title: the Burning Vengeance
personagens.blurb: Once a tribesman of the icy Freljord named Kegan Rodhe, the creature known as Brand is a lesson in the temptation of greater power. Seeking one of the legendary World Runes, Kegan betrayed his companions and seized it for himselfâ€”and, in an instant, the...

personagens.name: Braum
personagens.title: the Heart of the Freljord
personagens.blurb: Blessed with massive biceps and an even bigger heart, Braum is a beloved hero of the Freljord. Every mead hall north of Frostheld toasts his legendary strength, said to have felled a forest of oaks in a single night, and punched an entire mountain into...

personagens.name: Caitlyn
personagens.title: the Sheriff of Piltover
personagens.blurb: Renowned as its finest peacekeeper, Caitlyn is also Piltover's best shot at ridding the city of its elusive criminal elements. She is often paired with Vi, acting as a cool counterpoint to her partner's more impetuous nature. Even though she carries a...

personagens.name: Camille
personagens.title: the Steel Shadow
personagens.blurb: Weaponized to operate outside the boundaries of the law, Camille is the Principal Intelligencer of Clan Ferrosâ€”an elegant and elite agent who ensures the Piltover machine and its Zaunite underbelly runs smoothly. Adaptable and precise, she views sloppy...

personagens.name: Cassiopeia
personagens.title: the Serpent's Embrace
personagens.blurb: Cassiopeia is a deadly creature bent on manipulating others to her sinister will. Youngest and most beautiful daughter of the noble Du Couteau family of Noxus, she ventured deep into the crypts beneath Shurima in search of ancient power. There, she was...

personagens.name: Cho'Gath
personagens.title: the Terror of the Void
personagens.blurb: From the moment Cho'Gath first emerged into the harsh light of Runeterra's sun, the beast was driven by the most pure and insatiable hunger. A perfect expression of the Void's desire to consume all life, Cho'Gath's complex biology quickly converts...

personagens.name: Corki
personagens.title: the Daring Bombardier
personagens.blurb: The yordle pilot Corki loves two things above all others: flying, and his glamorous mustache... though not necessarily in that order. After leaving Bandle City, he settled in Piltover and fell in love with the wondrous machines he found there. He...

personagens.name: Darius
personagens.title: the Hand of Noxus
personagens.blurb: There is no greater symbol of Noxian might than Darius, the nation's most feared and battle-hardened commander. Rising from humble origins to become the Hand of Noxus, he cleaves through the empire's enemiesâ€”many of them Noxians themselves. Knowing that...

personagens.name: Diana
personagens.title: Scorn of the Moon
personagens.blurb: Bearing her crescent moonblade, Diana fights as a warrior of the Lunariâ€”a faith all but quashed in the lands around Mount Targon. Clad in shimmering armor the color of winter snow at night, she is a living embodiment of the silver moon's power. Imbued...

personagens.name: Draven
personagens.title: the Glorious Executioner
personagens.blurb: In Noxus, warriors known as Reckoners face one another in arenas where blood is spilled and strength testedâ€”but none has ever been as celebrated as Draven. A former soldier, he found that the crowds uniquely appreciated his flair for the dramatic, and...

personagens.name: Dr. Mundo
personagens.title: the Madman of Zaun
personagens.blurb: Utterly mad, tragically homicidal, and horrifyingly purple, Dr. Mundo is what keeps many of Zaun's citizens indoors on particularly dark nights. Now a self-proclaimed physician, he was once a patient of Zaun's most infamous asylum. After "curing" the...

personagens.name: Kennen
personagens.title: the Heart of the Tempest
personagens.blurb: More than just the lightning-quick enforcer of Ionian balance, Kennen is the only yordle member of the Kinkou. Despite his small, furry stature, he is eager to take on any threat with a whirling storm of shuriken and boundless enthusiasm. Alongside his...
